snippet.title: Murders on the Yangtze River — Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Suspenseful case, Diverse investigation, Rigorous reasoning, Intense debate. Chinese-style detective game "Murders on the Yangtze River" will release free English DEMO in April ! 

Add "Murders on the Yangtze River" to your Steam wishlist✅
